auth

Class UserAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • auth.UserAuth

  • public class UserAuth
extends Object
    Methods for authenticating and authorizing user actions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserAuth() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Session authenticateLogin(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user login attempt.
      static boolean canUserAccessChore(int userId, int choreId)
      Checks if a user can read and modify a Chore.
      static boolean canUserAccessHousehold(int userId, int householdId)
      Checks if a user can access a Household, that is, if the user is part of that Household.

      Checks if a user can read and modify a ShoppingList.
      static boolean canUserDeleteNotification(int userId, int notificationId)
      Checks if a user can delete a notification, that is, only if the user is the associated user of the notification.

      Checks if a user can read another user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserAuth

        public UserAuth()

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateLogin

        public static Session authenticateLogin(String email,
                                        String password)
        Authenticates a user login attempt. Generates and returns a Session for this user if the login was successful, or null if the email/password combination was incorrect.
        Parameters:
        email - the user email address
        password - the plain-text password
        Returns:
        a Session object, or null.

      • canUserReadUser

        public static boolean canUserReadUser(int userId,
                                      int subjectUserId)
        Checks if a user can read another user. This is true if both users are members of the same household.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to check
        subjectUserId - ID of the second user to check
        Returns:
        whether the user can read the other user

      • canUserAccessChore

        public static boolean canUserAccessChore(int userId,
                                         int choreId)
        Checks if a user can read and modify a Chore.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to check
        choreId - the chore ID
        Returns:
        whether the user can access the chore or not

      • canUserAccessHousehold

        public static boolean canUserAccessHousehold(int userId,
                                             int householdId)
        Checks if a user can access a Household, that is, if the user is part of that Household.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to check
        householdId - the Household ID
        Returns:
        whether the user can access the Household or not

      • canUserAccessShoppingList

        public static boolean canUserAccessShoppingList(int userId,
                                                int shoppingListId)
        Checks if a user can read and modify a ShoppingList.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to check
        shoppingListId - the ShoppingList ID
        Returns:
        whether the user can access the ShoppingList or not

      • isUserHouseholdAdmin

        public static boolean isUserHouseholdAdmin(int userId,
                                           int householdId)
        Checks if a user is admin of a Household.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to check
        householdId - the Household ID
        Returns:
        whether the user is a admin or not

      • canUserDeleteNotification

        public static boolean canUserDeleteNotification(int userId,
                                                int notificationId)
        Checks if a user can delete a notification, that is, only if the user is the associated user of the notification.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID
        notificationId - the notification ID
        Returns:
        whether the user can delete the notification or not
